sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {toInteger} from "lodash"; import {Client} from "../services/client"; import {HttpErrorResponse} from "@angular/common/http"; import {ClientService} from "../services/client.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-see-info-client', templateUrl: './see-info-client.component.html', styleUrls: ['./see-info-client.component.css'] }) export class SeeInfoClientComponent { public oneClient: Client | undefined; constructor(private clientService: ClientService) { this.clientService = clientService; } ngOnInit(){ this.getOneClient(); console.log(this.oneClient?.id) } public getOneClient(): void{ this.clientService.getClientById(toInteger(localStorage.getItem("Client"))).subscribe( (response: Client) => { this.oneClient = response; }, (error: HttpErrorResponse) => { alert(error.message); } ) } }
